body.name: TaIYanG Wireless Mouse, 2.4G Portable Optical Quiet RGB Mouse with USB Receiver and Type C Adapter, 3 Adjustable DPI Levels, Wireless Computer Mouse for Laptop, Computer, PC, MacBook, Desktop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Led Wireless Mouse】This wireless mouse with color lights can give you more fun during office time. You can choose use the 2.4G wireless mouse with the USB receiver to your laptop, or connect mouse with Type-C to USB adapter to your Macbook, easy to switch,suitable for any occasion.

【Silent Mouse Rechargeable】Noiseless click, no worrying about disturbing others beside you, let you concentrate on work. Built-in durable rechargeable battery, it can be easily charged using the included USB cable.

【3 DPI Adjustable Mouse 】DPI buttons are after the mouse scrool wheel, 3 adjustable DPI level s( 1000, 1200, 1600) to change the speed and sensitivity of your laptop mouse cursor freely. Ergonomic design and suitable button strength make you comfortable enough to work and study.

【Portable Computer Mouse and Operation Notice】 Slim and lightweight, Size : 4.33 in * 2.3 in * 0.86in, durable ergonomic mouse is perfect for travel. The USB receiver is stored inside the back of the mouse. No need for a driver, Plug and Play! Automatic sleep mode and wake-up mode are installed to save energy. Pls Turn off the mouse when not in use to expand the using life.

【Wide Compatibility Mouse Wireless】An accurate USB mouse with an working distance of up to 10 meters（33 feet） which can enables fast data transmission without delays or dropouts,fit for the computer micro usb and type c port, never think about the usb port. Well compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10 / Vista / Windows ME Mac OS, Also support type c connection, this led wireless mouse perfectly fits for desktop, laptop, PC, macbook and other devices. ANY PROBLEM about the computer mice, you can contact us anytime.
body.description: Frequently Asked Question lf the wireless mouse does not light up, the mouse usb connection failure, it may be insufficient battery power in the mouse, please use the charging cable to the mousefull charge first.To Save power and provide long-term usage, the wireless mouse will fall asleep after 10 minutes of no-operation.If you do not use the mouse for a long time, please turn off the OFF- button to save power. System Requirements The scroll wheel only works under the operating systemslisted above. If you use the mouse under a different operatingsystem, the mouse neither works nor keeps its enhanced features.The USB receiver can be reserved on the bottom of the mouse after using. prevent losing it.If yau are using a desktop computer, it is recomimended that you plug the USB receiver into the host computer so that you can use it better.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specification Warking voltage:3.7v Charging Time: 2-3H Battery: Rechargeable lithium battery Backit LED: 7 Color Breathing lights Battery Capacity: 50CmAh Life Time: Over 30days Package 1x Rechargeable Wireless Mouse1x TYPE-C Charging Cable1x USB Receiver (Placed on the bottom of the mouse)1x Type-C to USB Adapter1x User Manual1x Card Frequently Asked Question lf the wireless mouse does not light up, the mouse usb connection failure, it may be insufficient battery power in the mouse, please use the charging cable to the mousefull charge first.To Save power and provide long-term usage, the wireless mouse will fall asleep after 10 minutes of no-operation.If you do not use the mouse for a long time, please turn off the OFF- button to save power. System Requirements The scroll wheel only works under the operating systemslisted above. If you use the mouse under a different operatingsystem, the mouse neither works nor keeps its enhanced features.The USB receiver can be reserved on the bottom of the mouse after using. prevent losing it.If yau are using a desktop computer, it is recomimended that you plug the USB receiver into the host computer so that you can use it better.

Suitable for Most Devices The wireless mouse has a Type-C adapter, which can be applied to most devices with USB ports and Type-C ports. 3-Level DPI With a DPI switch button on the top of the mouse, and you can adjust the DPI level 1000-1200-1600 dpi to meets various needs. Quiet Click Quiet clicks free your worry about bothering others, and the click lifespan for left/right button would be 5 million times.

2.4GHz Stable Connection Laptop mouse stable wireless transmission distance up to 10m. Plug and play, no delay or drop out How to Use Charge the Computer Mice for about 2 -3 hours before using it for the first time.Take the dongle out, which is stored under the back of the mouse.Insert the dongle into the USB port of your PC.Turn on the wireless mouse, the switch is at the bottom of the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works good. I like the color and lights. Easy to move and long battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well. After two months, no complaints.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a fine, inexpensive wireless mouse. Nothing wrong fancy but also nothing to complain about. The battery lasts long in on one charge. I have only had it for a couple of months and I’ve charged it twice. It charges easily.One nice feature is that when you aren’t using it, there is a switch on the bottom to turn it off. This saves battery power. If you don’t turn it off between sessions, it will go to sleep in five or ten minutes, but the battery will drain a little still in sleep mode. So I try to remember to flip it over and flick the switch to off.I’m glad I purchased it. Not for high-end gaming performance but for everyday office use of my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Pretty Good!
reviews.reviewText: I like it! :) Feels good in my hand and it clicks well. The colors are pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Scroll ball stopped working but still a good wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: I'd give it 5 stars but roller ball stopped working after about 2 weeks but it doesn't really affect the use of it. Other than than I really like this mouse. It's light weight. Stays charged for a long time and it's pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta, super ergonómico, y los colores al moverlo.. son un espectáculoNo tengo necesidad de estar comprando baterías constantemente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a week.
reviews.reviewText: Edit: I informed the seller who was super responsive and sent out a replacement. replacement is working perfect!The mouse is super pretty but it stopped working after a week...just completely dead. Wont charge or do anything an ive tried everything. super disappointed because it matches my laptop perfectly and is super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very visually appealing mouse, and it's quite useful too. Stays charged for quite a while and never has issues being connected or responding to clicks/movements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just as described! My daughter loves the color. I love that fact that it comes with an adapter for the tablet to use. Its great and worth the money.
